text: Rakuen no nakama wa hi goku no nakama ni mukatte sakebudearou. `Watashi-tachi wa omo no yakusoku ga shinjitsudearu koto ga wakatta. Anata gata mo omo no yakusoku ga shinjitsudearu koto ga wakatta ka.' Kare-ra wa `hai' to kotaerudearou.
